member.name: M:CSLib.Net.Extensions.EnumExtensions.HasFlag(System.Enum,System.Enum)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value has flag.
member.returns: true if the specified value has flag; otherwise, false.
member.exception: The specified enum value types do not match.

member.name: M:CSLib.Net.Extensions.StringExtensions.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified string value is null or white space.
member.returns: true if the specified string value is null or white space; otherwise, false.
